## ⚡ Priority & Effort

**Priority:**
- [ ] P0 - Critical (must have)
- [ ] P1 - High (should have)
- [ ] P2 - Medium (nice to have)
- [ ] P3 - Low (when time permits)

**Estimated Effort:**
- [ ] XS (< 1 day)
- [ ] S (1-2 days)
- [ ] M (3-5 days)
- [ ] L (1-2 weeks)
- [ ] XL (2+ weeks)

**Complexity:**
- [ ] Low - Straightforward implementation
- [ ] Medium - Some complexity, standard patterns
- [ ] High - Complex logic, new patterns, or cross-cutting concerns
